plot: Jens Olesen presents studio experiments with animals. Also featuring animal explorations with Chapper in "Temli' Væmli'" and Mikkel in "Snushanen".
title: Blå Barracuda
plot_es: Jens Olesen presents studio experiments with animals. Also featuring animal explorations with Chapper in "Temli' Væmli'" and Mikkel in "Snushanen".
